about_the_game:
Tokyo Neural Groove is a game inspired by a story that tells a tale of strange characters living in Tokyo in the year 2116. It follows their struggles and the bizarre choices they make. In the cyberpunk world of TNG you will be a cybertech genius, a smart chick who's trying to save her own skin, a mafia criminal, a secret intelligence agent, a sketchy chick gun-for-hire and… who knows who else?

Tokyo Neural Groove is a thrilling cyberpunk adventure game that features beautifully crafted pixel art and is inspired by classic point 'n click games and interactive fiction. As you navigate through the neon-lit streets of Tokyo, you'll encounter a host of intriguing characters and objects. You can interact with the environment and other characters using the arrow keys or mouse clicks, and as you explore, you'll unravel a complex web of mysteries and secrets that will challenge your problem-solving skills. As you progress through the game, the puzzles become increasingly intricate and require you to think critically and creatively to solve them. You'll also collect a variety of useful and unique items that will help you overcome obstacles and advance in the game. With each level, you'll be drawn deeper into the gripping storyline and face new challenges that will put your skills to the test.

Enter a world of cyberpunk-inspired adventure where the choices you make will determine the fate of the characters you meet. Explore every nook and cranny of the richly detailed environments, searching for clues and essential items to unlock the next chapter of the story. But be careful, as danger lurks around every corner, and your success will depend on your ability to think like the classic interactive fiction games of the past. This is an adventure where logic is king, and you must use your wits to avoid traps, outsmart your foes, and immerse yourself in the personalities of the characters you control. Unlock your blurry cyberpunk memory and pay attention to details as you progress through the game, listening to both friends and enemies to understand their motivations and emotions, and uncovering the secrets of the world around you.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains adult content such as: crime, murders, genetic experiments, drugs, some nudity, bad language, street violence such as shootings, extortion, threats, blackmail, theft and everything related to crime.
